abstract: It’s a good thing the Apple iPhone is pretty, because its two-megapixel camera sure won’t help you look good. Griffin Technology is hoping to remedy that.
snippet: It’s a good thing the Apple iPhone is pretty, because its two-megapixel camera sure won’t help you look good. Griffin Technology is hoping to remedy that.
lead_paragraph: It’s a good thing the Apple iPhone is pretty, because its two-megapixel camera sure won’t help you look good. Griffin Technology is hoping to remedy that.

headline.main: A Supplemental Lens, to Make Sure Your iPhone Is Ready for Its Close-Up
